mapper.select: /* [com.coway.trust.biz.homecare.po.impl.HcConfirmPoMapper.selectHcConfirmPoSubList] - KR JIN */ SELECT PO_NO , PO_DTL_NO , STOCK_ID , STOCK_CODE , (SELECT STK_DESC FROM SYS0026M WHERE STK_ID = A.STOCK_ID AND STK_CODE = A.STOCK_CODE) as STOCK_NAME , SUPLY_ITEM_CD , PO_QTY , PO_QTY AS CONFIRM_QTY , UOM , PO_UPRC , SUPLY_PRC , TAX , TAX_CD , LOCAL_AMT , (SUPLY_PRC+TAX) AS TOTAL , CUR , PO_DTL_STS_CD , FREX_AMT , RM , USE_YN , CRT_DT , CRT_USER_ID , UPD_DT , UPD_USER_ID FROM HMC0005D A WHERE PO_NO = #{sPoNo} and USE_YN = 'Y'
